property.DESCRIPTION: Location of the primary data files for the database. Tables using the global (DATA) use this value to resolve their path.
property.NAME: DATA

property.DESCRIPTION: Location of the data dictionary files.
property.NAME: DICTIONARY

property.DESCRIPTION: Type of access to use when accessing the data dictionary files.
property.NAME: DD_ACCESS_USER_TYPE

property.DESCRIPTION: Specific user to use when accessing the data dictionary files (optional).
property.NAME: DD_ACCESS_USER

property.DESCRIPTION: Threshold to use to determine which 2 digit year values should be considered 19xx or 20xx on date formats that use 2 digit years.
property.NAME: Y2KWINDOW

property.DESCRIPTION: Character set to use for encoding/decoding values in the database.
property.NAME: CHARSET

property.DESCRIPTION: Type of ordering to use when sorting and grouping.
property.NAME: ORDERING

property.DESCRIPTION: Use case insensitive keys on XKEYED and VKEYED files. Requires recreating the file.
property.NAME: CASE_INSENSITIVE

property.DESCRIPTION: Use collation on ESQL files.
property.NAME: ESQL_COLLATE

property.DESCRIPTION: Type of data file to create by default and when using CREATE TABLE.
property.NAME: CREATETABLETYPE

property.DESCRIPTION: Open a console window on the server when a SPROC is executed to allow for dot-step debugging.
property.NAME: SPROC_DEBUG

property.DESCRIPTION: True to have BBj SQL assume variable length terminated column values right-padded with spaces are equivalent to those without the padding.
property.NAME: HANDLE_VARIABLE_LENGTH_PADDED_VALUES

property.DESCRIPTION: Pad VARCHAR values with VARCHAR Pad Character to the length defined in the table definition.
property.NAME: CONSISTENT_PADDING

property.DESCRIPTION: Pad character to use if Consistent Fixed Length Padding is also enabled.
property.NAME: PAD_CHARACTER

property.DESCRIPTION: Truncate character based values if they are longer than the length defined in the data dictionary.
property.NAME: TRUNCATEIFTOOLONG

property.DESCRIPTION: Automatically analyzed tables when they have not been analyzed or need reanalysis based on structural changes to the data file.
property.NAME: AUTO_ANALYZE_TABLES

property.DESCRIPTION: Use optimization on equality comparison on type NUMERIC values. Does not apply to ESQL which always optimizes on these values.
property.NAME: EQOPTIMIZENUMERICS

property.DESCRIPTION: For NUMERIC columns on keyed files, if the data is an empty string in the record, SQL will return zero instead of null if this setting is true.
property.NAME: NUMERIC_EMPTY_STRING_AS_ZERO

property.DESCRIPTION: Database is read only regardless of user permissions.
property.NAME: READONLY

property.DESCRIPTION: When creating a table, ensure that a primary key is explicitly defined.
property.NAME: STRICTKEYCHECKING

property.DESCRIPTION: The type definition to use when creating a table and specifying a DATE type column.
property.NAME: DEFAULT_DATE_TYPEDEF

property.DESCRIPTION: The date format to use when creating a table and specifying a DATE type column. Used in conjunction with Default Date Type Definition.
property.NAME: DEFAULT_DATE_FORMAT

property.DESCRIPTION: BBjSQLFactory Implementation Class
property.NAME: SQL_FACTORY

property.DESCRIPTION: Custom scalar/group function SSCP
property.NAME: SQL_FACTORY_SSCP

property.DESCRIPTION: Type of database.
property.NAME: TYPE

property.DESCRIPTION: With this enabled, variable length fields will give an error if you try to put a value that exceeds their defined length. By default, the length in variable length fields is only a guideline. This was legacy behavior for string templates.
property.NAME: ENFORCE_VARCHAR_LENGTH

property.DESCRIPTION: True if SPROCs should run as the user logged into the database otherwise it uses the user used to start BBjServices.
property.NAME: SPROC_RUN_AS_USER

property.DESCRIPTION: Whether SQL should optimize on DATE type columns that contain indexes. Not all types of raw data will generate correct results. If you are not sure, set to false.
property.NAME: OPTIMIZEDATECOLUMNS

property.DESCRIPTION: Use advisory locking for all file access in this database.
property.NAME: ADVISORYLOCKING

property.DESCRIPTION: Use auto commit by default if the table type supports transactions (ESQL).
property.NAME: AUTOCOMMIT

property.DESCRIPTION: Timeout in milliseconds for file connection operations.
property.NAME: TIMEOUT

property.DESCRIPTION: Timeout in seconds for file access operations that occur inside SQL statements such as write, remove, and read.
property.NAME: STATEMENT_TIMEOUT

property.DESCRIPTION: Classpath to use when executing SPROCs.
property.NAME: SPROC_CLASSPATH

property.DESCRIPTION: Alignment setting if this is a NUMERIC type column. Non-NUMERIC type columns ignore this setting.
property.NAME: ALIGN
